settings.title: OVERALL VOL 24H
settings.value:
itbitvol = parseFloat(datasources["ITBIT-BTCUSD"]["volume24h"])
geminivol = parseFloat(datasources["GEMINI-BTCUSD"]["volume"]["BTC"]) 
krakenvol = parseFloat(datasources["KRAKEN-BTCUSD"]["result"]["XXBTZUSD"]["v"][1])
coinbasevol = parseFloat(datasources["COINBASE-BTCUSD"]["volume"])
bitstampvol = parseFloat(datasources["BITSTAMP-BTCUSD"]["volume"])

totalVol = itbitvol+geminivol+krakenvol+coinbasevol+bitstampvol

return totalVol.toFixed(6)

settings.title: ITBIT
settings.value:
itbitvol = parseFloat(datasources["ITBIT-BTCUSD"]["volume24h"])
geminivol = parseFloat(datasources["GEMINI-BTCUSD"]["volume"]["BTC"]) 
krakenvol = parseFloat(datasources["KRAKEN-BTCUSD"]["result"]["XXBTZUSD"]["v"][1])
coinbasevol = parseFloat(datasources["COINBASE-BTCUSD"]["volume"])
bitstampvol = parseFloat(datasources["BITSTAMP-BTCUSD"]["volume"])

totalVol = itbitvol+geminivol+krakenvol+coinbasevol+bitstampvol

bid = parseFloat(datasources["ITBIT-BTCUSD"]["bid"])
ask = parseFloat(datasources["ITBIT-BTCUSD"]["ask"])
price = (bid+ask)/2

itbitVolShare = (itbitvol/totalVol)*100

result = "$"+price.toFixed(2)+ " VOL: "+itbitvol.toFixed(6) + " <"+ itbitVolShare.toFixed(2) +"%>"

return result

settings.title: KRAKEN

volShare = (krakenvol/totalVol)*100

result = "$"+price.toFixed(2)+ " VOL: "+krakenvol.toFixed(6) + " <"+ volShare.toFixed(2) +"%>"

return result
